markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Reflexive Tattoo](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1291)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Tattoo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=262" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 38</row>

**Price** 350 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** tattoo

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This subtle pattern of complex dots, sunbursts, and lines is difficult to make out, as it's a near match for the wearer's skin tone. Serving as a barrier facing inward, this tattoo prevents ostentatious expressions of spells that are internal to you, making them easier to hide.

<document level="2" id="action-1021" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Reflexive Tattoo
